Transparency.justification: Score = 1 because 3 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Fostering equity in the era of AI - Marsh McLennan
relevantSources.summary: The article discusses how transparent AI systems provide clearer understanding of decision-making factors, enabling better scrutiny and more effective oversight of AI processes.

relevantSources.title: Generative AI - Marsh McLennan
relevantSources.summary: Overview of Marsh McLennan's approach to generative AI, highlighting their commitment to responsible AI adoption and transparency in AI implementation.

relevantSources.title: Marsh McLennan Develops New Generative AI Tool
relevantSources.summary: Announcement of LenAI, Marsh McLennan's internal generative AI tool, detailing its development process and transparency measures implemented.

Transparency.findings: Marsh McLennan provides concrete evidence of transparency in their AI practices, including detailed explanations of how their AI systems work and are scrutinized. Their public communications describe transparency as a core principle, with specific examples of transparent development and deployment processes for their generative AI tools.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.justification: Score = 1 because 3 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Fostering equity in the era of AI - Marsh McLennan
relevantSources.summary: The article discusses how AI models can perpetuate biases from training data and outlines approaches for addressing AI bias and promoting equitable decision-making.

relevantSources.title: Why AI Bias Is Easier To Eliminate Than Human Bias - Oliver Wyman
relevantSources.summary: Analysis of how AI can help identify and measure prejudice, with strategies for companies to use AI to create fairer outcomes.

relevantSources.title: Manage AI Bias Instead of Trying To Eliminate It - Marsh McLennan
relevantSources.summary: Discussion of the inherent biases in AI systems and strategies for managing rather than eliminating bias, with a three-step process for reducing AI bias.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.findings: The company demonstrates a sophisticated understanding of fairness and bias mitigation in AI, offering specific frameworks and strategies for identifying, measuring, and managing bias. Their resources go beyond high-level statements, providing actionable guidance and evidence of ongoing efforts to address equity in AI systems.

Explainability.justification: Score = 1 because 5 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: LenAI: A Generative AI Tool By Marsh McLennan | Phil Hobson
relevantSources.summary: LinkedIn post discussing how AI model validation can promote responsible AI, noting that generative AI brings challenges with unpredictability and explainability that need to be addressed.

relevantSources.title: Trusting the mind of a machine - Marsh McLennan
relevantSources.summary: Comprehensive whitepaper on AI explainability, transparency, and interpretability, discussing the importance of understanding machine decisions and establishing trust in AI systems.

relevantSources.title: Three Areas Where AI Will Boost Your Competitive Advantage
relevantSources.summary: Article discussing how AI model explainability improvements lead to more reliable models with more understandable methods and results.

relevantSources.title: Agentic AI in action: Marsh McLennan Built an Agentic AI - YouTube
relevantSources.summary: Video presentation showcasing LenAI implementation, including how fine-tuning improved intent recognition and explainability of the system.

relevantSources.title: How AI is changing the way we think about risk - Marsh McLennan
relevantSources.summary: Article discussing how AI risk exacerbates concerns around bias and explainability, increasing ethical and reputational risk.

Explainability.findings: Marsh McLennan provides multiple detailed resources on AI explainability, including whitepapers, articles, and videos that discuss technical approaches and the importance of model interpretability. Their materials demonstrate a clear commitment to making AI systems understandable and trustworthy for both internal and external stakeholders.

Human Oversight & Accountability.justification: Score = 1 because 3 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: "Human in the Loop" in AI risk management â€“ not a cure-all approach
relevantSources.summary: Analysis of the "human in the loop" approach to AI risk management, discussing its limitations and requirements for effective implementation.

relevantSources.title: How to use generative AI safely with human oversight - LinkedIn
relevantSources.summary: Webcast discussing the importance of implementing technical, process, and people controls with human oversight to mitigate risks associated with generative AI.

relevantSources.title: 2024 Business Responsibility Report
relevantSources.summary: Report stating that Marsh McLennan upholds rigorous usage safety protocols, emphasizing human oversight over all AI operations where there is risk of biases and output inaccuracies.

Human Oversight & Accountability.findings: The company offers detailed, practical discussions and official documentation on maintaining human oversight in AI operations. These sources outline both the limitations and best practices for human-in-the-loop approaches, as well as formal commitments to oversight in their business responsibility reporting.

Privacy & Security.justification: Score = 1 because 2 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Marsh McLennan Develops New Generative AI Tool
relevantSources.summary: Announcement detailing how LenAI was developed with regulatory requirements in mind, including privacy, compliance, and security considerations.

relevantSources.title: Debunking Generative AI myth #1: Who owns GenAI risks - Marsh
relevantSources.summary: Article discussing the importance of technical controls, governance structures, and education in managing generative AI risks, including privacy and security concerns.

Privacy & Security.findings: Marsh McLennan provides concrete evidence of privacy and security practices in AI, including technical controls, regulatory compliance, and risk management strategies. Their communications address AI-specific privacy and security risks and outline mitigation approaches in detail.

Governance & Accountability.justification: Score = 1 because 3 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Managing business risks in a digital world - Marsh McLennan
relevantSources.summary: Comprehensive framework for AI governance based on intent, fairness, transparency, safety, and accountability, with practical implementation guidance.

relevantSources.title: 2024 Business Responsibility Report
relevantSources.summary: Report detailing Marsh McLennan's commitment to responsible AI usage through a comprehensive framework emphasizing compliance, risk management, and ethics.

relevantSources.title: AI in business: Four considerations for risk managers - Marsh
relevantSources.summary: Article outlining four key considerations for risk managers regarding AI implementation, including governance structures and accountability frameworks.

Governance & Accountability.findings: The company provides multiple, detailed resources outlining formal governance frameworks and accountability structures for AI. These include practical guides, business responsibility reports, and dedicated publications on risk management in digital contexts.

Public Commitments & External Audits.justification: Score = 1 because 2 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: 2024 Business Responsibility Report
relevantSources.summary: Report outlining Marsh McLennan's commitment to responsible AI usage through a comprehensive framework that emphasizes compliance with legal standards and ethical principles.

relevantSources.title: AI Work & Risk Roadmap - Marsh McLennan
relevantSources.summary: Overview of Marsh McLennan's AI Work & Risk Roadmap, designed to help organizations develop plans for AI deployment while managing associated risks.

Public Commitments & External Audits.findings: Marsh McLennan publicly documents its commitments to responsible AI and risk management, including formal frameworks and roadmaps for AI deployment. Their ESG report and published roadmap provide verifiable evidence of public commitments and leadership in responsible AI.

summary.overallFindings: Marsh & McLennan Companies, Inc. demonstrates mature, comprehensive responsible AI practices across all seven pillars. The company provides detailed, verifiable evidence for transparency, fairness, explainability, human oversight, privacy, governance, and public commitments, including technical documentation and formal frameworks. No significant gaps were identified, and the breadth of public evidence indicates a strong organizational commitment to responsible AI.
